item.description: Bring your dog to our all breed meet-up!! We have an indoor room especially designed for indoor doggy play. Our center will provide water, toys, and clean-up. It's a great way to meet new people and for your dog to make new friends. All friendly dogs welcome, all breeds welcome. We do request that your pet is vaccinated with Rabies, Distemper, and Bordetella because they will be interacting with other dogs. There is no charge for this meet-up. Hope you can make it!!!! WOOF.
item.how_to_find_us: Check in at the front desk.....meet-up is held in the doggy daycamp room.

group.name: The Rocky Hill "All Breed" Meetup Group

item.name: March Madness Meet-up Group
